blocks.subject: RE: An allocated turbine
text: Jeff--I have another matter slotted in at 11.  Any way we can do this at
noon?  Perhaps we can carve out a bit of time between 10:30 and 11?

blocks.from: Jeff Dasovich@ENRON on   Sent by: Jeff Dasovich@ENRON
to: Mike D Smith/HOU/EES@EES, Paul Kaufman/PDX/ECT@ECT, Richard  Shapiro/NA/Enron@Enron, MDay@GMSSR.com, James D Steffes/NA/Enron@Enron, Harry  Kingerski/NA/Enron@Enron
blocks.subject: Meeting to Discuss Legal Issues
raw_header: To: Mike D Smith/HOU/EES@EES, Paul Kaufman/PDX/ECT@ECT, Richard
Shapiro/NA/Enron@Enron, MDay@GMSSR.com, James D Steffes/NA/Enron@Enron, Harry
Subject: Meeting to Discuss Legal Issues
text: Since things will move pretty quickly from this point forward, we want to
have a quick meeting to explore our legal options and how best to preserve
them.  We'd like to have a kickoff call after the daily 10 AM (CST ) call
that Wanda Curry handles.  Are you available after Wanda's call?  Say 11 AM
